OTHER INTERESTING EXPERIENCE:
I love the outdoors and am a rockhound. Throughout the year, as a ham radio operator, I am net control for many events around Idaho, like the Riggins Jet Boat Race, IMTU Ultra Marathon, etc. As a special education teacher, I work with students with various needs.
